Akshay is the son of Sandeep Marwah, who runs a production studio in Delhi, and is the older brother of actor Mohit Marwah and close relative of Anil Kapoor. The whole Kapoor khandan is present at the wedding celebrations.
Abu Dhabi is surely becoming a hot destination for  weddings. Recently, Abhishek Bachchan, Sridevi, Sonali Bendre, and other Bollywood celebrities attended the lavish wedding of Anushka Rajan, daughter of Karuna and Abhijit Rajan, in Abu Dhabi. 
Inside Photos! Abhishek Bachchan, Sridevi attend wedding in Abu Dhabi
